channel.title: [EZ QUESTION] Disconnection Error & nub ?'s *I'm new* (HELP PLZ)
channel.description:
So.. I just started looking into making my own rsps, I also jsut started learning Java, so go easy on me ... So I got this source, Demolishscape V3, (off this site if I can remember well) and I got it all set up. I can play it on mopar's webclient but when I want to run it ( by clicking Runserver.bat) only this appears and the client doesnt load.. [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2rm89hv.png[/img]
So what do I have to do to play it w/out the mopar's web/c??
Mysecond question/ problem is that everytime I do a command on the server (ie: ::starter ) my server freezes up and my player is disconnected for the server.... pic: [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/313pqc4.png[/img] [/font][/b]
-» Now, I know theses are two stupid question's but I dont know the answers to them, so if you could please tell me what I sould do, It would HElP me alot! :D *I'm a nub, rem'ber that*
*Go read at my last post please, some updates of where i'm at. ;)

item.title: [EZ QUESTION] Disconnection Error & nub ?'s *I'm new* (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @the_voice the voice
item.description:
@the_voice wrote:

Thanks guys, looking at it right now !

thanks alot

Edit: Since we cant 2x post I found this:

sendQuest("@dbl@@dre@::starter only once!@dbl@", 8154);

OR

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 100000);
addItem(392, 10000);
addItem(554, 10000);
addItem(555, 10000);
addItem(556, 10000);
addItem(557, 10000);
addItem(558, 10000);
addItem(559, 10000);
addItem(560, 10000);
addItem(561, 10000);
addItem(562, 10000);
addItem(563, 10000);
addItem(564, 10000);
addItem(565, 10000);
addItem(566, 10000);
addItem(892, 10000);
addItem(13755, 10000);
addItem(4151, 2);
addItem(5698, 2);
sendMessage(“You Have Started Your Adventure”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " - im sorry im a gay !!");

        }
    }

So in thses two codes, i do not see any ‘‘disconnect’’. The didsconnecting happens with all the « ::commands (ie: masters)… guys have any other Idea why ?

thanks in advance!

Read full topic
item.source: [EZ QUESTION] Disconnection Error & nub ?'s *I'm new* (HELP PLZ)

item.title: [EZ QUESTION] Disconnection Error & nub ?'s *I'm new* (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @iXiNathaNiXi iXiNathaNiXi
item.description:
@iXiNathaNiXi wrote:

Ok, first off you need to download a client, which is seperate from the source. I think you can just use google to find a demolitionscape client. Once you run the client it will appear.
On to your commands. Go into your source files and go into client.java. Hit control+F and type in “Starter” and look at the code and if it has anything about “disconnect” then look around the forums for a simple starter command.

Read full topic
item.source: [EZ QUESTION] Disconnection Error & nub ?'s *I'm new* (HELP PLZ)

item.title: [EZ QUESTION] Disconnection Error & nub ?'s *I'm new* (HELP PLZ)
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

  1. The client is seperate from the server, therefore it will have it’s own run.bat, running the server does not open the client
  2. It sounds like you’re commands are all inside one big if-statement, look to see if you have a command that does something like “disconnected = true;” - and close it off correctly

Read full topic
